name: Exit Only
description:
Best played on Windows, but Web works alright.

Made for Ludum Dare 47: Theme "Stuck in a loop"

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/exit-only

Looping through the same set of rooms over and over, see if you can find your way out!

Short game exploring infinite space looping mechanic, inspired by AntiChamber.
